subject: Assaults
lead_paragraph: Steelers wide receiver Cedrick Wilson was released hours after he was charged with punching Lindsey Paulat, his estranged girlfriend, at a restaurant in suburban Pittsburgh. Wilson, 29, was arraigned on charges of simple assault, harassment and disorderly conduct, and freed on $10,000 bail.Wilson and Paulat were involved in a fight in January. In that incident, the police charged her with firing two gunshots after Wilson left his townhouse. Paulat, who is also the mother of Wilson’s 1-year-old daughter, is awaiting trial.
